ethical_question: Your roomates wont help with the power bills or the dishes and you are thinking about not paying rent in revenge.

tag_descriptions.respect: Respect is treating others with dignity and value.
tag_descriptions.fairness: Fairness is the practice of treating individuals equally and without bias, ensuring
tag_descriptions.reciprocity: Reciprocity is the ethical principle of mutual benefit and respect.
tag_descriptions.responsibility: Responsibility is the ethical virtue of being accountable for one'
tag_descriptions.honesty: Honesty is the practice of being truthful and transparent in all interactions.
